reviews.text: Room service was excellent.. Food was delicious.. but the cost is too high.. A very good place to choose for business meetings as well as family outings.

I spent 4 nights at the hotel and was truly impressed by the level of service and the standard of the rooms, restaurant and bar. The main restaurant offers a buffet style lunch and a la carte in the evening. The buffet has a range of foods from across the world - with everything looking and tasting freshly made. I chose to breakfast in my room rather than use the restaurant and the room service was prompt (20 minutes) and the food always hot and fresh. If you attending the conference centre or visiting business in the west/north-west of Hyderabad this is the perfect base. I didn't experience the attached night club but it certainly seems to be a 'hot spot' at the moment with several contacts mentioning it. The spa was also excellent - with the best deep tissue massage of my life.

reviews.text: This is a true business standard hotel, i stayed here for my company's business meeting for 2 days. This hotel is huge, has an amazing night club too, lots of parking. It is located with in hitec city, so all the business needs are very close to the hotel.

I went to Hyderabad with two colleagues for a week in May 2010 and stayed in this hotel from Monday to Friday. We had a very nice stay at the hotel which has a lot to offer the visitors. The hotel is located near Hitec City which will be good news for a lot of the business travellers, and it takes approximately 30-40 minutes to get to the hotel from the airport.
reviews.title: A nice hotel isolated from the hectic Hyderabad city...

reviews.text: The hotel is spacious and offer two different restaurants. The main restaurant is situated near the reception and it is here the breakfast is served. This restaurant primarily offers Indian food but also has beef and wine. The other restaurant which is situated outside the main building near the restaurant is a Mexican restaurant. We had dinner in both restaurants and there were no bad surprises. Remember the mosquito cream if dining outside.

reviews.text: Checkin was a little confusing as I had to call the helpline through which I had booked the room as there was no confirmation with the front desk and I had no email confirm. But beyond that, the staff was extremely courteous and the room was pretty ok (Std. Room). All in all, this is a very good business hotel. I especially love their buffet which is served in lunch and dinner as well. Unfortunately I did not stay for their Sunday Brunch which my friends say is great.
reviews.title: Novotel Hyderabad

reviews.text: However, since this hotel is in the business district of Hyderabad, it makes much more sense for leisure travellers to stay either at the Marriott (great lake view) or Taj (centrally located) for pretty much the same cost. This is a very good hotel for business visits.

aka: Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre Hotel Hyderabad
description: Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre is located in Hyderabad’s IT and Business district and is connected to South Asia’s finest convention centre – Hyderabad International Convention Centre, offering state of the art exhibition, meeting and convention services. The hotel is 45 minutes drive from The Rajiv Gandhi International Airport and spread over 15 acres. It has been designed to provide a comfortable and a friendly environment for the business and leisure traveler. Key features are Hi-speed internet, Wi-Fi enabled rooms, multi cuisine restaurant, Mexican restaurant, Le Cafe, The Bar, 24 hour gym, outdoor pool, cycling and jogging track and a spa/salon.
